# Authors

This repository is maintained by the **FireHub Project** teams.

## Core Development
- FireHub Admin Team – governance, standards
- Core Dev Team – architecture, domain design, core framework development
- Quality Assurance Team – testing, validation, automated pipelines

## Adapter Development
- HTTP Dev Team – HTTP adapter implementation
- Console Dev Team – Console / CLI adapter implementation
- Future Adapter Teams – responsible for additional FireHub adapters

## General / Cross-Repo Teams
- Triage Team – issue triage, PR review
- Design Team – UI/UX, documentation visuals
- Community / Support Team – GitHub issues, support, contributor engagement
- Security Team – audits, dependency review, PHAR verification
- Maintainers – Oversee all repos, merge PRs, enforce coding standards

## Infrastructure & Operations
- CI/CD Maintainers – Configure GitHub Actions workflows, manage build and deploy pipelines
- Documentation / Guides Team – writing guides, API references, templates
- Release Managers – PHAR releases, changelog, versioning

## Other Contributors

The full list of individual contributors can be found on the [GitHub Contributors Graph](../../../graphs/contributors).

## Notes
- Individual contributors are tracked via GitHub commit history.
- Ownership and maintenance are defined per repository.
- For contribution guidelines, refer to the [CONTRIBUTING guide](https://github.com/The-FireHub-Project/.github/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).
